alert.note: Alert for Coeur d'Alene Area; Idaho Palouse (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 4:04PM MST until January 09 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations 2 to 6 inches. Locally higher amounts possible Idaho Palouse to north of Coeur d`Alene. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph Tuesday morning. * WHERE...Harrington, Coulee City, Wilbur, Rosalia, Cheney, Grand Coulee, Fairfield, Rockford, Ritzville, Moscow, Uniontown, Coeur d`Alene, Plummer, Potlatch, Pullman, Genesee, Worley, Post Falls, Spokane Valley, Creston, Downtown Spokane, Davenport, Airway Heights, Colfax, Oakesdale, Hayden, La Crosse, Tekoa, and Odessa. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slick road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact travel Monday evening through Tuesday. Strong winds could cause localized damage to trees and power lines. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Localized higher snow amounts are possible where snow is slow to transition to rain Tuesday. Winds will increase on Tuesday after most of the snow has fallen. Gusts to 45 mph possible by Tuesday afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Idaho, for the latest road information, call 5 1 1. In Washington, for the latest travel information, go to https://wsdot.wa.gov/travel
